name: Florsheim
description:
This is a pair of men's Oxford dress shoes from Florsheim in size 9. 
 They are dark brown and feature a square toe, lace-up closure, and a low-top ankle. 
 Each one of the shoes measures about 11.75 heel to toe and 4.5 across the ball of the foot. They were made in India with leather and man-made materials. 
 These shoes are in very good pre-owned condition, the only signs of wear are some small creases in the leather out near the toes.
